fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: If there is only one session during the year, your answer should reflect the length of this session. If there are multiple sessions, your answer should reflect the total time spent in session, adding together the length of all sessions during the year.
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: During the year, for how long was the upper chamber of the legislature in session?

fxInfo_responses.value: It did not convene at all during the year.
It did convene, and was in session for less than 1 month, in total.
It did convene, and was in session for 1-2 months, in total.
It did convene, and was in session for 3-5 months, in total.
It did convene, and was in session for 6-8 months, in total.
It did convene, and was in session for 9 months or more, in total.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v3lginsesup
